item.title: Cardinal Who Threatened to Crash the Conclave Now Says He Won’t

item.title: U.S. Eases Ban for Diplomats at Vietnam War Anniversary
item.description: The administration had said that no senior U.S. envoys could attend the events marking 50 years after the war’s end. On Tuesday, the U.S. consul gener...

item.title: Power Is Restored in Spain and Portugal After Widespread Outage
item.description: Electricity was back in most of the two countries after a blackout that shut down much of daily life. The cause of the outage remained unclear.

item.title: How Photography From the Vietnam War Changed America
